definition: general/commander-in-chief (military)/king (chess piece)/to command/to lead
to desire/to invite/to request
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
"piece of wood" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 90), mirror image of 片[pian4]
classifier for strips of land or bamboo, shops, factories etc/slit bamboo or chopped wood (dialect)
"ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
a unit of length/inch/thumb
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
in the future/future/the future/CL:個|个[ge4]
official gatekeeper/goalkeeper (soccer, hockey etc)
almost/nearly/close to
(in classical literature) young military officer of high rank for his age/(during the Cultural Revolution) young militant in the Red Guard/(in modern usage) rising star (in sport, politics etc)
inevitably
lit. old general/commander-in-chief 將帥|将帅, the equivalent of king in Chinese chess/fig. old-timer/veteran
famous general
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
will/shall/to be going to
general/admiral/air chief marshal
mahjong/CL:副[fu4]

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享頁面時，您可以將用戶指定爲查看者或編輯者。

sentences.english: The lesions will "bleach out" and become clean wounds that will heal after a molt.
sentences.chinese: 病變會“漂白了”，成爲清潔傷口癒合後，將蛻皮。

sentences.english: Your shortstop will never forget about practice again.
sentences.chinese: 您的游擊手將永遠不會忘記的再實踐。

sentences.english: We are committed to help them do the latter.
sentences.chinese: 我們承諾將幫助他們化敵爲友。

sentences.english: In the article 50 Totally Free Lessons in Graphic Design Theory the TutsPlus family definitely delivers with a bevy of knowledge building lessons in theory
sentences.chinese: 50節圖形設計免費課程將教授你大量的理論知識。

sentences.english: As far as the plot goes, we know how it's going to end.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道故事情節將怎樣結束。

sentences.english: God knows that , and created us totally free.
sentences.chinese: 上主深明此理，因此將我們創造成了自由。

sentences.english: A Confederate boat carried Fox to Sumter.
sentences.chinese: 一艘邦聯的船隻將福克斯運送到薩姆特堡。

sentences.english: The recipient will be left with multiple half-open connections that are occupying limited resources.
sentences.chinese: 收件人將留下多個半開連接佔用有限的資源。

sentences.english: Offenses with this characteristic usually will be encountered as assimilative crimes.
sentences.chinese: 帶有此特徵的犯罪行爲通常將視爲同等犯罪。

sentences.english: These ignition wires send the charge to each spark plug.
sentences.chinese: 這些點火導線將電荷運送至每個火花塞。

sentences.english: Sends the encrypted session key to the server.
sentences.chinese: 將加密的會話密鑰發送給服務器。

sentences.english: The next step is to desaturate the layer that will take on the bloom effect.
sentences.chinese: 下一步是對圖層進行去飽和，圖層將獲得輝光效果。

sentences.english: He jazzed up the room with some bright red curtains.
sentences.chinese: 他用一些鮮紅的窗簾將房間裝飾得更具生氣。

sentences.english: Once Synechococcus spp. forms bloom, its influence will be far-reaching to whole ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: 一旦形成赤潮，對整個生態系統的影響將非常深遠。

sentences.english: And yet, the writing life continues to capture its victims.
sentences.chinese: 但是，寫作的生活將繼續捕捉愛好它的“落網之魚”。

definition: auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
and/to give/together with
to take part in
variant of 歟|欤[yu2]
at the same time/simultaneously
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
and/besides/moreover/furthermore/in addition
o'clock/time/when/hour/season/period
surname Shi
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
surname Ying
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
border/edge/boundary/interval/between/inter-/to meet/time/occasion/to meet with (circumstances)
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to continue/to persist/sustainable/preservation
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to balance an account/accountancy/accounting
